message_2:
To determine the degree of membership of the number 7 in the fuzzy set A, we need to find the value of the membership function μA(x) at x = 7.

According to the given membership function:

μA(x) = {0 if x<5; (x-5)/5 if 5<=x<=10; 1 if x>10}

Since 7 is between 5 and 10 (5<=7<=10), we will use the second part of the membership function:

μA(7) = (7-5)/5 = 2/5 = 0.4

Therefore, the degree of membership of the number 7 in the fuzzy set A is 0.4.
